Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Iowa
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Chicago, kedzie, Grand and Homan due to street blockage near Homan/Iowa.
